line.words: 遊園地（ゆうえんち）に行（い）ったよ

subtitle.line: I went to the theme park.

line.words: 行ったことあるかい？行ったのかい？

subtitle.line: Have you been there too? Did you go too?

line.words: 遊園地に行ったよ

subtitle.line: I went to the theme park.

line.words: 行ったことあるかい？行ったのかい？

subtitle.line: Have you been there too? Did you go too?

line.words: 遊園地に行って見たよ

subtitle.line: I went to the theme park

line.words: 観覧車（かんらんしゃ）とメリーゴーラウンド

subtitle.line: and saw the big wheel, the merry go round,

line.words: ジェットコースターにおばけ電車（でんしゃ）

subtitle.line: the rollercoaster and ghost train.

line.words: ガイコツが見（み）えて怖（こわ）かった

subtitle.line: I felt scared when I saw the skeleton.

line.words: 遊園地に行ったよ

subtitle.line: I went to the theme park.

line.words: 行ったことあるかい？行ったのかい？

subtitle.line: Have you been there too? Did you go too?

line.words: 遊園地に行ったよ

subtitle.line: I went to the theme park.

line.words: 行ったことあるかい？行ったのかい？

subtitle.line: Have you been there too? Did you go too?

line.words: おばけ電車の中（なか）真（ま）っ暗（くら）で

subtitle.line: In the ghost train, it was very dark.

line.words: 白（しろ）い目（め）のフクロウとオオカミ見（み）たよ

subtitle.line: I saw a white eyed owl and a wolf.

line.words: かいじゅう出（で）てきてネズミもいたよ

subtitle.line: A monster did appear and so did a rat.

line.words: くさりの音（おと）聞（き）こえて怖かった

subtitle.line: I was scared as I heard the noise of the chains.

subtitle.line: Have you been there too? Did you go too?
